me.mjolnir.mineconomy.internal
Class MCCom

java.lang.Object
  me.mjolnir.mineconomy.internal.MCCom

public class MCCom
extends java.lang.Object

Handles exterior classes reading/writing account values.

Author:
MjolnirCommando
